DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Butterfly Stamp Kit (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Butterfly Stamp Kit is a great choice for your next garden themed or butterfly themed party. The Kit includes 3 face paint stamps (flower, butterfly and butterfly2) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (pale blue, bright pink and purple).
Snazaroo's specially designed EVA stamps are perfect for use on children. The stamps are approximately one and a half inches at the widest point and one inch thick. Easy to use even for beginner users.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: This Stamp Kit will paint about 750 cheek art designs.
Includes 3 face paint stamps (flower, butterfly and butterfly2) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (pale blue, bright pink and purple).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
